author: Editor
title: World’s sexiest hotel pools
text:
Posted on July 8, 2015 by Editor 
I used to think the kiddie pool I lugged up on my Brooklyn roof for parties was pretty fancy. Or, at least, sort of okay. That kiddie pool set the bar pretty low for me, but whether you’re still a kid inside or it’s been decades since you stopped thinking it was fun to spend your days like a 4-year-old, we can all appreciate these uber-sexy hotel pools: 
Jessica Festa is the founder on the solo and offbeat travel blog, Jessie on a Journey , and the online responsible tourism and culture magazine, Epicure Culture . She’s constantly searching for local experiences beyond the guidebook. You can follow her travels on Facebook , Twitter and Instagram .
